mapper.insert: INSERT INTO images ( image_name, image_format, image_data, creat_time, update_time, template_id ) VALUES ( #{image.imageName}, #{image.imageFormat}, #{image.imageData}, #{image.creatTime}, #{image.updateTime}, #{image.templateId} );
mapper.select: SELECT image_id, image_format, image_name, image_data, template_id FROM images WHERE image_id = #{id}
